title: Richard Reinsch on the Enlightenment, Tradition, and Populism
description: Richard Reinsch, editor of Law and Liberty and the host of the podcast Liberty Law Talk, talks with EconTalk host Russ Roberts about the Enlightenment. Topics discussed include the search for meaning, the stability of liberalism, the rise of populism, and Solzhenitsyn's indictment of Western values from his Harvard Commencement Address of 1978.
author: webmaster@econlib.org (EconTalk: Russ Roberts)
